Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It is valued at $8,000 and offers exceptional benefits tailored to meet your needs. Considering its high quality and value, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7,200. This is a special opportunity to acquire a top-tier item at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
